channel.title: Running 32x and 64x
channel.description: Ok well i have a 64x computer and whene ever i use a 32x client it crashes after 3 steps. please help me i have a server and the client only works with 32x what do i change on my comp to make it run without closing

item.title: Running 32x and 64x
item.dc:creator: @wboar wboar
item.description:
@wboar wrote:

Replace your run to this one:

@echo off cd Client Files "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members exit

And dont forget to change path to your class files.
And idk if ur client got Gui or Jframe. So if you got Jframe then use this:

@echo off cd Client Files "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Jframe 0 0 lowmem members exit

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
